items.text: runs the length ball down to third man for one
items.shortText: Henry to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: just wide of mid-on this time. Sabbir gives the charge and goes for the pull against the shorter ball, mid-on is in and he slams it just a bit to his right and in the gap for four
items.postText: Even though Mehidy is on 16 off 18, Isam believes Saifuddin should bat above him
items.shortText: Henry to Sabbir Rahman, FOUR runs
Neesham to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: six down, 10 overs to go and he goes for another attacking stroke that results in a top-edge and a really simple catch for Nicholls at point. Mehidy gave the charge again by making some room and slashed hard outside of, got a top-edge that went pretty high and Nicholls got under it easily
items.shortText: Neesham to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, OUT

dismissal.text: Mehidy Hasan Miraz c Nicholls b Neesham 16 (24m 20b 1x4 0x6) SR: 80.00

items.text: reaches deep midwicket after a bounce amid shouts of 'catch it'. Sabbir saw the short ball and pulled, thankfully for him not with all his power so it didn't reach de Grandhomme at the rope
items.shortText: Neesham to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: back of length outside off and he watches it go
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.preText: Mehidy's shot selection proves why Isam wanted Saifuddin batting above Mehidy
items.text: just outside off and he taps the ball to point
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: shorter on off this time and the length gives him time to run it down to third man and keep strike
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: on the pads and it's flicked away nicely in the gap for two
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, 2 runs

items.text: on the leg side again, it's tucked off the pads behind square with soft hands and Saifuddin completes the second with a dive after running hard
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, 2 runs

items.text: fuller on the pads and he clips it straight to midwicket on this occasion
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: bangs in a bouncer at 139kmh well outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: full on the pads again and flicked away easily with the wrists to leg for one
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: a bouncer at 142.2kmh left alone to end the over. Oh it's called a wide
items.shortText: Ferguson to Sabbir Rahman, 1 wide

items.text: wants to smash the full ball down the ground but doesn't middle it and mistimes it to mid-on
items.shortText: Ferguson to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: hint of room outside off and he taps it late to third man
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: dances down and absolutely smashes that back between the non-striker and the umpire to send it racing to the boundary. Short ball and flat-pulled down the ground
items.shortText: Neesham to Sabbir Rahman, FOUR runs

items.text: shortish again and pulled to midwicket this time
items.shortText: Neesham to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: back of length outside off now and he cuts it straight to point
items.shortText: Neesham to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: no room outside off and he defends it into the off side
items.shortText: Neesham to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: towards the pads this time and Sabbir wants two after ticking it towards fine leg, but there's not enough time for a second
items.shortText: Neesham to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: in the block hole outside off, he bunts it down to mid-off
items.shortText: Ferguson to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: reaches mid-off after a bounce as Sabbir drives the full ball with some power
items.shortText: Ferguson to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: uses the upper cut for the short ball with soft hands for a single to third man
items.shortText: Ferguson to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: angles in the short ball towards his ribs, Saifuddin gets the top of the bat to the leg side and toes off, Taylor has a shy at non-striker's end and misses as the batsman dives
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run
